posts.post_content:
Forgive me if this is somewhat gauche, but I'm looking to spend $175 or so in order to grow my collection of graded pre-war Brooklyn cards.

I'd be interested in hearing what you might have available in terms of PSA/SGC graded Brooklyn cards from the following sets: T206 (particularly less-common backs such as Old Mill, Sovereign, etc), T205, most E cards (especially E90-1), CJs, and OJs. 

Please feel free to message/e-mail with info on any cards that might fit the bill. 

Thanks in advance for considering.
